definition.name: action-maven-publish
definition.description: GitHub Action for automatically publishing Maven packages
definition.author: Samuel Meuli

inputs.name: gpg_private_key
inputs.description: GPG private key for signing the published artifacts

inputs.name: nexus_username
inputs.description: Username (not email!) for your Nexus repository manager account

inputs.name: server_id
inputs.description: Nexus server ID as specified in your project's `nexus-staging-maven-plugin` and `distributionManagement` configurations

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: Directory of the Maven project which should be deployed

inputs.name: maven_goals_phases
inputs.description: Maven goals and build phases to execute

inputs.name: maven_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the Maven command
